"}, {"content": "
The high schooler is a lazy person.

The high schooler is a lazy person because they are not actively contributing to society. They are not learning, they are not working, and they are not engaging in any productive activities. They are not taking advantage of the opportunities available to them to become more educated, gain skills, or improve their lives.
